Key:
Shido...et up... How much longer do you plan
on sleeping?
Rinne... Sorry, just a little longer.
OUCH!
Who you calling Rinne?
Ouchhhh. Hm? K-Kotori, why?

How long do you plan on sleeping? Weren't you
the one who was making breakfast today?
Oh! That's right. Rinne's not coming, huh?

Not coming? You're the one who told her not
to come, remember? Jeez, you're trying too hard
to act cool in front of Rinne.

Well, I mean she may be our childhood friend, but
we're relying on her too much. Yesterday, she came
over to make us dinner even though she was busy.

Rinne's the type of person who would break
her back for other people, and wouldn't say
no even if she wanted to.
...Sounds like someone I know.
Hm? Did you say something?

Nope. So, why are you just standing there?
Who do you think you are, not even changing?

Or, do you want your adorable little sister
to help you? Shido, you're a piece of work.

WHAT?! It's only because I was talking to you
about Rinne.

I know that. She's my childhood friend, too.
Anyways, isn't there something you need to
do right now?
Oh, sorry. I'll make something right now.
That's the way... HEYYYY!
Wh-What's wrong, Kotori?!

Jeez, you're such a slacker. Don't you know that
it's starting?
Huh?! What's starting?!
The morning horoscope, DUH!

(Despite being in her black ribbon state,
Kotori's still Kotori...)
All right. I'll whip up something good.

Hmm, what do we have? I guess I'll use
whatever.
All right. This looks good.

Kotori, were you able to watch the horoscope?
How's your luck looking today?
Hmm... It's all right.

I see. HEY! Are you eating candy before
breakfast again?!
Who cares? I'll eat breakfast, too.
*sigh*...

You know, if you want your brain to work,
you need sugar. I'm just getting the proper
sugar intake.
Unlike you, Shido, I have much to think about.
I have no idea what you're talking about.
You just lack the ability to understand.

I see. Then, why didn't you say so from the
get-go?!

Yappy men aren't attractive. You know that,
right? Oh, look. The Tengu Tower is on TV.
How strange.

Tengu Tower, huh? You're right. Ever since the
Neo Tengu Tower was built, no one ever mentions
the original.

Man, talk about stolen thunder. Not like it
was much of a tourist spot to begin with.

Right. I think I went back in the day, but
I don't even remember what was there.
Huh? Tengu Tower is a monument, right?
What? Was it?

It used to be popular, remember? There was
the myth that if you confess your love in front
of the monument, you'll be together forever.
Hmm...

(Something feels off. That monument. Hmm...
I guess I can find the time to check it out
soon.)

Oh. The water is boiling. I'll prepare
breakfast in no time.
G...! Good morning, Shido-san...!
Yooo-hooo Shido-kun! Morning!

Yo, good morning Yoshino, Yoshinon. I'm
preparing breakfast, so take a seat.
U...Um! L-Let me help!
What? You?
Rinne isn't coming over today, right?
Oh, right...
Yoshino thought you might have difficulty, so\nshe's been worried all morning. You just\nrecovered, so we didn't know if you'd be okay!

I-I see. Then, I guess it'd be nice if you can
help me.
O-Okay! I-I'll try my best!
Isn't that nice, Yoshino? I'm sure Shido-kun's\nheart will melt when he sees how adorably\nyou cook!

H-Hey, Yoshinon! When you say that, it makes
it harder for Yoshino to help me.
Mmm, I wonder. I don't think so.

U-Uh, let's get started. Yoshino, could you pass
me the soy sauce?
O-Okay!
Oh!
Yikes!

A-Are you okay, Yoshino?! Did it get on your
clothes?!
I... I'm sorry...

This is nothing. Were your clothes stained?
It's pretty tough to remove soy sauce.

Good, seems like you're fine. It's okay to be
nervous now and then.
Yoshino! Don't worry!
I... I'll wipe it now!

Don't worry. Let me. Yoshino, would you mind
grabbing some plates for me?
O-Okay!

Y-Yoshino?! Are you okay?! A-Are you hurt
at all?!
W...Waaaah!
OHHH! Shido, now you've done it!
What?! Is it my fault?

(I guess it is, huh? Yoshino can only use one
hand. I shouldn't have asked for her help.)
(Oh, seems like the pot's boiling.)
O-Oh, I know! Hey, Yoshino...?
Wha...?

This pot seems to be boiling, so could you open
the lid and check?
Oh. Th...The lid over there?

Yeah. Oh! It's hot. I turned off the fire, but be
careful, okay?
O...Okay...
HOT! IT'S HOT! YOSHINO! HURRY HURRY!
(All right! Yoshino used Yoshinon as a glove!)
O...Okay!

Good job, Yoshino! You can just place the
lid there!
O-Okay! OOOOO...Over here?!
Yeah! There is fine!
...! I-It seems to be boiling well!
Oh! Good job, Yoshino!
It's all thanks to Yoshinon... for being there!

I think it was a good team effort between
you and Yoshinon.
Ahahaha. Yoshino can do whatever she\nputs her mind to. Ahh, that was so hot.

S...Sorry, Yoshinon! Shido-san... Th-Thank
you... so much.
I guess this is what Yoshino and Yoshinon\nare made of, right? Aren't we amazing?

Y-Yeah... It was amazing. I'm glad you didn't
get burned. Good job, Yoshinon!
Aw, shucks. You sure know how to flatter.\nWhat do you want, since you're egging me on\nso much?

Hm. Well, if this is what you're made of, do
you think you could put all of the food into
the bento box? Can you do it, Yoshino?
Y-Yes! I-I will do my best!
I gueeeess. Well, I guess Yoshino and\nYoshinon will go all out and work hard\nin Rinne's absence!
All right! Thanks!
O-Okay!
You got it!
